title: Check if List Elements are Identical
description: In Python, you can easily check if all elements in a list are identical using a simple function. In this challenge, you will be tasked with creating a function that checks if all elements in a list are identical.

meta.title: Checking for Identical Elements in Python Lists
meta.description: Learn how to easily check if all elements in a Python list are identical using a simple function.
meta.keywords: identical elements, python, set, all equal, list
